item.title: PF pfctl cheat sheet
item.description: Pobrane z https://gist.github.com/tracphil/4353170 1basic pfctl control 2== 3Related: http://www.OpenBSD.org 4Last update: Tue Dec 28, 2004 5== 6Note: 7this document is only provided as a basic overview 8for some common pfctl commands and is by no means 9a replacement for the pfctl and pf manual pages. General PFCTL Commands 1# pfctl -d disable packet-filtering 2# pfctl -e enable packet-filtering 3# pfctl -q run quiet 4# pfctl -v -v run even more verbose Loading PF Rules 1# pfctl -f /etc/pf.
